label: Games and Puzzles
description: Entertainment products that challenge the mind and provide fun for all ages.

subcategories.label: Jigsaw Puzzles
subcategories.description: Puzzles made of interlocking pieces that form a picture when completed.

subcategories.label: Board Games
subcategories.description: Games played on a board or surface that involve strategy and competition.

subcategories.label: Brain Teasers
subcategories.description: Puzzles or games that challenge the mind and require problem-solving skills.

subcategories.label: Coloring Books
subcategories.description: Books with illustrations or designs that can be colored in with pencils or markers.

subcategories.label: Party Games
subcategories.description: Games that are played at parties or social gatherings.
